name: Press Space to Learn Your Lesson
name_original: Press Space to Learn Your Lesson
description:
Whenever I learn something, it stays good and learned. Never ever ever does an issue from my past (which I have already "gotten over") come back to bite my present. My life is a steady journey of continuous improvement.

This game gives you a little glimpse of what that feels like.

Hint: It's amazing.

INSTRUCTIONS

RIGHT ARROW or D to move onwards.

SPACE to learn your lesson.

M to mute.
